meanings.definition: Search widely for food or provisions.
meanings.sent1: The bear was foraging for berries in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The squirrel enjoys foraging for nuts in the park.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon was caught foraging through the trash cans for leftovers.
meanings.sent4: The chef was foraging through the pantry for ingredients to make dinner.
meanings.sent5: The birds were foraging eagerly for worms after the rain.
